description: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history
name: Clear PowerShell History
query: ((powershell.file.script_block_text:*Set\-PSReadlineOption* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*SaveNothing* AND (powershell.file.script_block_text:*–HistorySaveStyle* OR powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-HistorySaveStyle*)) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:(*del* OR *Remove\-Item* OR *rm*) AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\(Get\-PSReadlineOption\).HistorySavePath*))
author: Ilyas Ochkov
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
